title: Notion AI — AI Tool Review
description: Notion AI is the built-in AI layer in Notion that helps you write, summarize, translate, and query your entire Notion workspace. Notion AI is the native AI integration within Notion that allows users to generate content, summarize notes, translate text, fix grammar, and ask questions about their entire workspace. It can draft meeting notes, create action items from transcripts, fill databases, and turn rough ideas into polished documents — all within your existing Notion workflow. Highlights: Native Notion integration. Queries your entire workspace. Summarization and translation. AI database filling. Seamless workflow integration.
